infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Garage Vault needs camera access to scan and identify items for your inventory using AI.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Garage Vault needs photo library access to select images of items for your inventory.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Garage Vault needs permission to save photos of your inventory items.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Garage Vault uses your location to remind you about low stock items when you're near hardware stores like Home Depot or Lowe's.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Garage Vault uses your location to remind you about low stock items when you're near hardware stores, even when the app is in the background.
